name.title: Project name
name.description:
The name of the project
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_project/index.html#name

start.title: Start date of the project
start.description:
Sets the first day of the project. All days before this day are considered invalid
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_project/index.html#start

tracking.title: Project tracking settings
tracking.description:
Can be one of "auto" or "explicit".
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_project/#tracking

defaultworkingtime.title: Default Working Time
defaultworkingtime.description:
Sets the default time per day for resources to work on tasks, unless configured differently for a resource. 
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_project/index.html#defaultworkingtime

timeperday.title: Time Per Day
timeperday.description:
Defines the amount of time that defines a business day. The default value of timeperday is 8h.
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_project/index.html#timeperday

businesshours.title: Business Hours
businesshours.description:
Describes how much time passes for each day of the week.
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_project/index.html#businesshours

imports.title: Imports
imports.description:
File imports for sub-projects or resource files
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_imports/index.html

resources.title: Resources
resources.description:
Resource definitions for a project.
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_resources/index.html

resource.title: Resource-Identifier
resource.description:
Unique identifier of a resource
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_resources/index.html#id

name.title: Name
name.description:
Full name of the resource
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_resources/index.html#name

dailymax.title: Daily Max
dailymax.description:
Max. availability of this resource per day
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_resources/index.html#dailymax

workingtime.title: Working Time
workingtime.description:
Configures when resources/workers are available for working on tasks during the week
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_resources/index.html#workingtime

leave.title: Leave
leave.description:
In a leave section you can tell the scheduler when employees are on leave
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_resources/index.html#leave

filter.title: Artificial resource filters
filter.description:
A resource filter can be used to limit the time a resource can spend on tasks
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_resources/index.html#filter

filter.title: Filter
filter.description:
Unique identifier of a resource filter
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_resources/index.html#filter

bookings.title: Bookings
bookings.description:
Booking records for explicit work assignments
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_updates/#bookings

^.*$.title: Resource Efforts
^.*$.description:
Booked efforts per resource. E.g.:
  dev1: 10d
  dev2: 3d
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_updates/#bookings

tasks.title: Tasks, Milestones and Groups for project

taskUpdates.title: Tasks, Milestones and Groups for project

active.title: Active
active.description:
An non active task will neither be considered by the scheduler, nor show up in the charts
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_tasks/#active

assign.title: Assign
assign.description:
Assigned resources (employees) who will work on this tasks
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_tasks/#assign

dailymax.title: Daily Max
dailymax.description:
Maximum amount of time all resources (combined) are allowed to work on this task per day
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_tasks/index.html#work-limits-dailymax-weeklymax-monthlymax

efforts.title: Efforts
efforts.description:
Cumulated amount of time resources (employees) need to spend working on this task
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_tasks/index.html#efforts

effortsleft.title: Efforts Left
effortsleft.description:
Amount of remaining efforts counted from the day of the current update
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_tasks/index.html#effortsleft

end.title: End
end.description:
End date of the task
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_tasks/index.html#end

length.title: Length
length.description:
Length of the task in business days/hours (no efforts)
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_tasks/index.html#length

lengthleft.title: Length Left
lengthleft.description:
Amount of remaining time counted from the day of the current update
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_tasks/index.html#lengthleft

locked.title: Locked
locked.description:
A locked tasks will not allow the scheduler to change the previously calculated start/end date due to changes in dependencies
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_tasks/index.html#locked

name.title: Name
name.description:
Display name of this task. Has no effect on scheduling
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_tasks/index.html#name

monthlymax.title: Monthly Max
monthlymax.description:
Maximum amount of time all resources (combined) are allowed to work on this task per month
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_tasks/index.html#work-limits-dailymax-weeklymax-monthlymax

priority.title: Priority
priority.description:
Scheduling priority of this task. The higher the number, the more likely it will be given required resources
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_tasks/index.html#priority

reschedule.title: Reschedule
reschedule.description:
Will unlock a locked task for a single task, so that dates will be rescheduled without breaking the task schedule
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_updates/#reschedule

start.title: Start
start.description:
Start date of the task
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_tasks/index.html#start

task.title: ID of this task
task.description:
Identifier of this task. All later references will use this identifier
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_tasks/index.html#taskmilestonegroup

tracking.title: Project tracking settings
tracking.description:
Can be one of "auto" or "explicit".
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_tasks/#tracking

weeklymax.title: Weekly Max
weeklymax.description:
Maximum amount of time all resources (combined) are allowed to work on this task per week
See https://taskfalcon.org/doc/config_tasks/index.html#work-limits-dailymax-weeklymax-monthlymax

updates.title: Contains list of incremental project updates
